name: Shiba World Cup
description: The Shiba worldcup will start at an initial size pre-public launch. 50% of the amount of the pre sale will be used to grow the fund. Shiba world token taxes will also be used to grow the fund Every week, 70% of the total fund value is contributed to a gambling stack. This stack will be bet throughout the following week. Earnings from the weeksbets will be re-invested into the fund as well as used to buyback and burn Shiba Worldcup tokens, boosting the price and increasing the liquidity.
